name: Twitch Plays Pokémon: Anniversary Red
summary: Crafted specifically for the 1-year anniversary TwitchPlaysPokemon's first run, Anniversary Red adds a ton of new content to the first gen Pokémon games. Enjoy new and enhanced features, such as being able to capture all 151 Pokémon, increased difficulty, the newly created Battle Tent, mysterious new dungeons, and unique events created specifically for this version.
